css: @keyframes pulse_animation { 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 #{{color_2}}; } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 200px #{{color_1}}; } } @keyframes loaderHide { 0% { opacity: 1; visibility: visible; } 100% { opacity: 0; visibility: hidden; } } #wp-page-loader {z-index: 9999; display: flex; position: fixed; width: 100%; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; background: #{{bg}}; top: 0; left: 0; } #wp-page-loader.available { animation: loaderHide; animation-duration: 1s; animation-fill-mode: both; } #wp-page-loader .pulse { margin: auto; } #wp-page-loader .pulse span { position: absolute; margin-top: -25px; margin-left: -25px; width: 50px; height: 50px; border-radius: 50%; background: #{{color_3}}; animation: pulse_animation 1.3s infinite; } #wp-page-loader .pulse span:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
